$interpreted: Sharice: Morning everyone~
Sharice: It is I, the G.O.A.T. Sharice Carterwell!

Unhappy Soldier: Hey, what's up with you! Can't you see we're
practicing our routine? You disrupted our flow!

Sharice: Hmph. I was just dropping by for a quick hi~
You guys are such weaklings. I barely made contact and you still go flying like tissue paper.
Sharice: See~
Irritated Soldier: T... this dummkopf... Whatever, ignore her.
Sharice: Hey, how can you guys just......

Sharice: Yeah yeah, keep it going.
More than two can play this game, ya know~

Sharice: Come on! Let's exchange some blows.
I promise I'll go easy on you... 
You'll stay alive, that much I can guarantee.
Sharice: Surely you both can learn a lot from me~
Irritated Soldier: ARGHHHHH, I can't take this anymore!
Irritated Soldier: I am going to punch her in the face, and none of you stop me! If you're with me, take up arms and get ready to kick her a**!
Unhappy Soldier: YEAHH!!! IN THE FACE!!!!
Goading Soldier: All for one and one for all! Get her!
Defeated Soldier: AHHHHHH!!!

Sharice: Told ya so~ I'm the real deal
and you lot ain't going to cut it with me.

Sharice: But then again, why are you all so mad? 
Blaming yourself for being weak in more than just the knees?
Unhappy Soldier: That's not the case! Have you not realized yet?
Unhappy Soldier: All of us here want nothing more than for you to p...
Jerome: What the hell are you guys doing here!
Jerome: On your feet, NOW!
Jerome: COMPANY!
Irritated Soldier: YE......YES, SIR!

Jerome: From today onwards, this hand-picked unit
will report directly to General Fredrica.
Jerome: Now, prepare to receive your new mission from the general!

Sharice: Desperate times call for desperate measures.
Recruiting me into this special unit... are we finishing off Sunshine Infantry once and for all?

Fredrica: Nyeh~ You're such an energetic bunny.
But no, my dear, that's the wrong answer.
Fredrica: Put it simply, our Majesty nonchalantly guaranteed to others that Maple Lake will be kingdom territory once the war is over.
Fredrica: So now, it's your job to scout that area and investigate its surroundings~
Sharice: Maple Lake! Isn't that like, far far away from the Kingdom?

Unhappy Soldier: Legend has it, many beasts and brutes
reside on its shores......
Sharice: Beasts and brutes? I myself don't believe that stuff one bit. Just some creepy crawlies blown out of proportion by flimsy rumors, I suppose?

Fredrica: Everyone's up and ready to go at a minute's notice.
Oh, how I envy such enthusiasm~

Fredrica: To whoever contributes the most to this mission, I will ensure that your merits be acknowledged by the higher-ups.
If you want an opportunity to prove your worth, you won't come across a better offer~
Sharice: (Prove...my worth...)

Fredrica: Handsome here will take care of the rest.
I'm going back to my beauty sleep. Adios~
Jerome: OK, LISTEN UP! I'm going to assign tasks now......

Model.Text: Morning everyone~
It is I, the G.O.A.T. Sharice Carterwell!

Hey, what's up with you! Can't you see we're
practicing our routine? You disrupted our flow!

Hmph. I was just dropping by for a quick hi~
You guys are such weaklings. I barely made contact and you still go flying like tissue paper.
See~
T... this dummkopf... Whatever, ignore her.
Hey, how can you guys just......

Yeah yeah, keep it going.
More than two can play this game, ya know~

Come on! Let's exchange some blows.
I promise I'll go easy on you... 
You'll stay alive, that much I can guarantee.
Surely you both can learn a lot from me~
ARGHHHHH, I can't take this anymore!
I am going to punch her in the face, and none of you stop me! If you're with me, take up arms and get ready to kick her a**!
YEAHH!!! IN THE FACE!!!!
All for one and one for all! Get her!
AHHHHHH!!!

Told ya so~ I'm the real deal
and you lot ain't going to cut it with me.

But then again, why are you all so mad? 
Blaming yourself for being weak in more than just the knees?
That's not the case! Have you not realized yet?
All of us here want nothing more than for you to p...
What the hell are you guys doing here!
On your feet, NOW!
COMPANY!
YE......YES, SIR!

From today onwards, this hand-picked unit
will report directly to General Fredrica.
Now, prepare to receive your new mission from the general!

Desperate times call for desperate measures.
Recruiting me into this special unit... are we finishing off Sunshine Infantry once and for all?

Nyeh~ You're such an energetic bunny.
But no, my dear, that's the wrong answer.
Put it simply, our Majesty nonchalantly guaranteed to others that Maple Lake will be kingdom territory once the war is over.
So now, it's your job to scout that area and investigate its surroundings~
Maple Lake! Isn't that like, far far away from the Kingdom?

Legend has it, many beasts and brutes
reside on its shores......
Beasts and brutes? I myself don't believe that stuff one bit. Just some creepy crawlies blown out of proportion by flimsy rumors, I suppose?

Everyone's up and ready to go at a minute's notice.
Oh, how I envy such enthusiasm~

To whoever contributes the most to this mission, I will ensure that your merits be acknowledged by the higher-ups.
If you want an opportunity to prove your worth, you won't come across a better offer~
(Prove...my worth...)

Handsome here will take care of the rest.
I'm going back to my beauty sleep. Adios~
OK, LISTEN UP! I'm going to assign tasks now......
